content: It's a performance and retention bonus tied to how much the execs could pump out of the taxpayers and the cost of concessions they could 'negotiate' out of the UAW. Not to mention the surgical cutting of the 'dead wood'. You need a well-paid clear mind to so that.

Wake up and smell the roses [Yeah, you need to.] in that greed is REAL and not just a fake "class warfare" syndrome imprinted in your brain by the Conv. Talk radio loons. You're trippin' over mouse drops. All of the bonus money combined is, alas, a tiny, tiny bit of the bailout, which is but a fraction of other financial shenanigans by the Fed and the Obamanites. What they have done is set up this nation for a tremendous risk, far worse than even the credit crap fomented by Congressional doofusses, irresponsible or dumb borrowers, and greedy non-managers for financial firms. This attention on bonuses is a sucker's concern, worrying about small change, ginned up polyticks that takes our attention away from the real threats, the real absurdities, the grave dangers to the nation's economic well-being.
